entry.title: $2400 // Bright 1 Bedroom + Den - Gowanus
entry.content:
Bright 1 bedroom plus Den floor-thru w/750 + S.F. Sunny living space.

Located on President Street in the Gowanus neighborhood between Carroll Garden's Smith Street and Park Slope's 5th Ave. Excellent local eateries, Ample Hill ice creamery, Royal Palms, Dino BBQ, Whole Foods nearby. Heat + Hot Water included. It's a 3rd floor apartment in a three unit building.

Available March 1st, 2019.

Trains: R,M @ Union St., F @ Carroll St.

Requirements: No Smokers, No Pets. 1st/Last/Security deposit.

A THOROUGH CREDIT CHECK will be performed. Please, only contact us if you have excellent credit and references.

Here's the important part: If you're interested in living here, compose an email telling us what you're looking for in a living space and a little bit about who'll be living here.

No Realtors Please! We are happily offering this as a NO FEE apartment.

entry.title: $2695 // Brownstone Garden Apartment
entry.content: Lovely floor-thru, one bedroom garden apartment in architect/owner's brownstone. Chef's kitchen, dishwasher, shutters, exposed brick. Tree-lined street near shopping and transportation (Q, B, 2 and 3 lines.) Close to Park Slope Food Coop, 5 minutes to Prospect Park, Botanic Gardens, Brooklyn Museum and Library. Gas included, no fee, no pets.

entry.title: $1725 // Spacious, Renovated 1BR, Dishwasher; Overlooking Sunset Park
entry.content:
Large 1BR on quiet, residential street overlooking Sunset Park
Renovated kitchen, stainless steel appliances
Dishwasher
Spacious living room, lots of light/many windows
Great for working professional
Wood floors, high ceilings, great closets
Near trains, shops laundry
Pets on approval :)
Available now

Please call for an appointment: RE BROKER: 646-431-7813

entry.title: $2700 // Park Slope 2 Bedroom Featuring a Great Kitchen and Pet-Friendly
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-150745.2) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=9044-cl

This is a 2 Bedroom in the Park Slope area of Brooklyn. The Apartment Features Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Hardwood Floors, Stainless Steel Appliances, Lots of Closet Space, and Intercom. Includes Heat, and Hot Water. Cats and Dogs Accepted on Approval.

  • Kitchen 15x9.5
  • Living Room 12.5x10
  • First Bedroom 12x11
  • Second Bedroom 11x8

Â 

Located in the heart of Park Slope, this apartment gives you access to lots of great local parks, attractions, restaurants, cafes, and bars.Â 

Living just blocks away from Prospect Park gives you unlimited access to all of what the park has to offer: Prospect Park Bandshell, Smorgasburg, the LeFrak Center, Prospect Park Carousel, Drummers Cove, the Prospect Park Zoo, Lefferts Historic House and the Brooklyn Botanical Garden just to name a few!

Enjoy other Parks and Greeneries such as Joseph Mayrose Park, Butterfly Gardens, the 6 15 Green, and the Historic Old Stone House and Washington Park. Enjoy local attractions and stores such as Brooklyn Glass, Gallery Players Theater, YMCA, Brooklyn Ethical Culture Society, Beacon's Closet - Park Slope, Littlefield, Barnes & Noble, Park Slope Food Coop, Brooklyn Public Library, Community Bookstore, Whole Foods Market, and New York Sports Club.Â 

Local restaurants and bars include: Four and Twenty Blackbirds, The Owl Farm, Barbes, The Black Horse Pub, and Dizzy's. Nearby health centers include NY Methodist Hospital, located right off of 6th Street and 7th Avenue.Â 

Park Slope also includes dozens of bike paths for easy travel.Subway access to the F, G, and R trains at the 4th Avenue / 9th Street Station. Commute is roughly 30 minutes to Midtown Manhattan. Only 2 stops to Atlantic Avenue / Barclays Center on the R train!

Â 

Walk Time to Nearest Train Stations

9th St (8 mins):Â Â Â Â Â F, G, R

7th Av (12 mins):Â Â Â Â Â F, G

South of Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Downtown Brooklyn
East of Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Gowanus, Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill
West of Windsor Terrace and Prospect Heights

Enjoy local attractions such as Brooklyn Glass, Gallery Players Theater, Greenwood Park Beer Garden, New York Sports Club, The End is Near, and Union Market. Local restaurants and bars include Giovanni's Brooklyn Eats, Black Horse Pub, Sea Witch and Terrace Bagels.

South Slope also includes dozens of bike paths for easy travel.Subway access to the R train at Prospect Avenue, and the F and G trains at 7th Avenue. Commute is roughly 30 minutes to Midtown Manhattan.

entry.title: $2325 // Beautiful 2 BEDROOM apartment for Rent in Park Slope + yard & laundry
entry.content:
Beautiful 2 BEDROOM apartment for Rent in Park Slope

The apartment is a very cozy and comfortable 2 bedroom apartment with a large balcony, plus backyard space, and laundry in building conveniently located in Park Slope, Brooklyn, just 2 blocks from the R train and a 5min walk to the F and G train. This is a first floor apartment.

The neighborhood is wonderful with great restaurants, cafes, and bars just around the corner! It's walking distance to some of the most exciting places in Brooklyn and minutes away from the beautiful Prospect Park.

Apartment includes:

- 2 bedroom (great light in both rooms and on opposite ends of the apartment)
- quiet street
- first floor
- full bathroom
- full kitchen
- hardwood floors all around
- laundry in building
- large balcony, plus a shared backyard space
- pets - OK
- heat and hot water included
- large closets
- please note that this would be a lease take over, with broker fee, which I'm willing to negotiate. Building management will require your paperwork to apply (standard stuff - pay stubs, decent credit, no evictions)
- available January 15 or February 1, 2019 - $2325

Looking forward to hearing from you!:)
Please contact Joanna at 646-329-2209 text/call or email.

entry.title: $2600 // Large 1 BR w/Garden. Utilities Included.
entry.content:
UTILITIES INCLUDED -- OUTDOOR SPACE

Our tenants of three years just moved for a job in California. This is a great space in an amazing central Slope location.

It's a large 1 bedroom, garden-level apartment in a classic brownstone, renovated with an open kitchen design, decorative fireplace and beautiful hardwood floors. We put in new appliances, including a dishwasher. There is extensive storage in an unfinished basement.

We (the landlords) live directly above you -- but you have your own entrance. We're on 9th street between 6th and 7th avenues, on the sunny South side of the street; less than one block to the F/G, two blocks to the R; across the street from the library; half a block from the fantastic Prospect Park Y; 2/3 of a block to the supermarket and to NYSC; and, of course, three blocks to Prospect Park. It is about a 4 minute walk from Methodist Hospital.

You get full use of the garden -- and an additional allowance for planting/gardening/landscaping supplies if you are so inclined.

And best of all: heat, water, electricity and gas are all included -- $150/month value. (You only pay for cable/internet - if you want those.)

Very flexible on appointments for showings.
